page_analysis.text_content:
Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning

Fig 41 Examples of site planning solutions for detached 2nd dwelling units and associated required parking

A Detached & separate from main-dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has a 1-car attached garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car detached garage. (Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line, it may be located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use driveway for their uncovered space (beyond front setback)
Interior lot example

B Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has 1-car attached garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car attached garage. (Because attached, it must be located with the building area rather than in the rear or side yards.)
• Both dwellings use driveway for their uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)
Interior lot example

C Detached & combined with main-dwelling parking
• Both dwellings share a 2-car detached garage. (Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line, it may be located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their respective uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)
Interior lot example

D Combined w/ main-dwelling parking that is attached to main dwelling
• Both dwellings share a 2-car attached garage.
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their respective uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)
Interior lot example

Key
_____ Curb
- - - - Lot line
⊔⊔⊔ Sidewalk
- - - Required setbacks
▓▓▓ Dwelling
■ 2nd-dwelling unit & associated pkg
□ Area that may not be used to satisfy required parking spaces
🚗 Buildable area
🚗 Uncovered space

45

visual_elements.description: Four site plan diagrams (A, B, C, D) showing different configurations of detached 2nd dwelling units and parking arrangements. Each diagram shows a lot with main dwelling, 2nd dwelling unit (900 sf max), buildable area (12' min), garage configurations, driveways, and setbacks. Diagrams include measurements and labels for various elements.
visual_elements.location: Center of page, arranged in a 2x2 grid

visual_elements.description: Legend/Key showing symbols used in the diagrams including curb, lot line, sidewalk, required setbacks, dwelling areas, 2nd-dwelling unit & associated parking, buildable area, and uncovered space

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum distance from front lot line for detached garage

structural_elements.main_heading: Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning

B Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking

additional_notes: Page number 45 appears at bottom right
Diagrams show detailed site planning layouts with various parking configurations
All examples are labeled as 'Interior lot example'

qualifiers.text: Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line

conditions.text: it may be located in the rear and side yards
it must be located with the building area rather than in the rear or side yards
it may be located in the rear and side yards
at least 75' from the front lot line

logical_relationships.expression: Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line, it may be located in the rear and side yards
Because attached, it must be located with the building area rather than in the rear or side yards

execution_sequence.action: Determine if garage is detached and meets distance requirement from front lot line
If detached garage meets distance requirement, allow placement in rear and side yards
If garage is attached, require placement within building area
